name: Javelin Toss
description:
made for the https://itch.io/jam/10-day-themed-game-jam-6

theme: spear

The Javelin toss is a classic Olympic sport where an athlete attempts to throw a spear or javelin as far a possible. 

How ever here we are taking it into a different direction and using these javelins as a means to replicate a classic shooter game. Using GB studio for a retro and classic feel something like if Duck Hunt as built for a hand held device.

All assets, music, and scripting are done by myself for this Jam.
